The shared directory of the pds_toolbox contains
source files that are shared among the following PDS tools:

ddict
kwvtool
lvtool
make_index
table_check
tbtool


The lists below show which source files found in the shared
directory to use for a particular tool:


ddict
-----
convert.c
convert.h
dirwalk.c (For Windows use only)
dirwalk.h  (For Windows use only)
ddaccess.c
ddaccess.h
labtool.c
labtool.h
search.c
search.h
verlabel.c
verlabel.h
